SELECT t.Id, t.head_line, t.telephone, t.msgCode, t.user_qq, t.user_wx, t.phone, t.link, t.createDate, t.company_name, t.procode, t.citycode, t.countycode, t.video_url, t.details, t.address, t.`status`, t.del, t.type, t.fw, t.service, t.price FROM fied t where 1=1
LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageSize} ORDER BY fied.createDate DESC

SELECT fied.Id, fied.head_line, fied.user_qq, fied.user_wx, fied.phone, fied.link, fied.createDate, fied.company_name, fied.procode, fied.citycode, fied.countycode, fied.details, fied.address, fied.type, fied.fw, fied.service, fied.userId, SUBSTRING(file.path,33) as path, fied.price, file.type as f_type FROM fied INNER JOIN file ON fied.userId = file.userId WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( fied.head_line like "%"#{val}"%" or fied.user_qq like "%"#{val}"%" or fied.user_wx like "%"#{val}"%" or fied.phone like "%"#{val}"%" or fied.link like "%"#{val}"%" or fied.company_name like "%"#{val}"%" or fied.details like "%"#{val}"%" or fied.address like "%"#{val}"%" or fied.type like "%"#{val}"%" or fied.fw like "%"#{val}"%" or fied.fw like "%"#{val}"%" )
AND file.type = 'G' GROUP BY fied.msgCode
